column4: I just updated my JRE to using SUNs on my Edgy and now Azureus wont start no more...
the one that comes with edgy, think it is the GNU version
trying to reinstall azureus now
Can you do a favour for your PC (do we call it that here?) and not use that resource hog?
sorry dude, dont really have any performance-issues with when running SUNs JRE... however on Windows I wouldnt touch it for the world
also, there are hardly any good alternatives on Linux since uTorrent doe snot exist
Are you castisaging Sun? <frowns>
A ex-utorrent user like me, should use ktorrent.
Did you try utorrent's web interface?
neh... not on gnome
web interface... nope, never heard of it
When will people accpet the fact that GNOME/KDE are innocent siblings, and the programs run with no ill-feelings in either environment?
There exists a web-interface for utorrent, go check it out
do you have a link?
let me find it
it seems it needs to run a .exe still...
so basically not for me...
you are right!
May i ask the reason for your reluctance to use ktorrent?
none whatsoever
than whats stopping you
